data.title: Bitter Jester Studios
data.meta_description:

One of the few companies specializing in corporate documentaries, BJS's work has been seen on television and in movie theatres across the country as well as on the web.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Bitter Jester Studios, Inc. (BJS) is an 11-time Emmy award-winning / 49-time Emmy-nominated Documentary, Creative, and Branded Entertainment production company specializing in imaginative, educational, and entertainment video solutions for individuals, corporations, and the general public. One of the few companies specializing in corporate documentaries, BJS's work has been seen on television and in movie theatres across the country as well as on the web. BJS has won almost 200 production awards since its inception. BJS's expertise lies in documentary film and creative commercial production/branded entertainment. BJS filmmakers have produced work across the globe, including in the Czech Republic, Portugal, Angola, Haiti, Cuba, Britain, and in half of the US states. The companyâ€™s focus is always on people and how those people fit within their organization or the world around them. Special care is taken during interviews to bring out the best of those appearing in front of the camera, often resulting in their comfortably forgetting they are being filmed.

Website

http://www.BitterJester.com

External link for Bitter Jester Studios

Industry

Broadcast Media Production and Distribution

2-10 employees

Specialties

Video production, documentary film, films, filmmaking, television commercials, commercial, Internet videos, media packages, photography, live theatre, live theater, training videos, and industrial video
